name: Black Diamond Shadow Rock Shoes - Unisex
description: Soft, sticky and aggressive. The Shadow Rock Shoes are the ideal tool for steep overhanging routes and boulder problems. Black Diamond NeoFriction rubber is the right blend of supple and sticky to get purchase on thin moves and outlandish smears. With a thin midsole that lets you feel the rock, and a rubber combo that minimizers bulk, the Shadow is on the softer end of the shoe spectrum. When the project demands high levels of precision and foot dexterity, the Shadow is the one.Aggressive downturned profile is for steep routes and boulders.4.3mm thick rubber is moulded for consistent thickness.Soft and sticky NeoFriction Fuse rubber.Microfibre upper is stretch-resistant to ensure a great, consistent fit.Minimalist midsole offers sensitivity on steep terrain.Tongue uses Engineered Knit Technology for breathability and comfort.Shoe vamp features a combo of printed and moulded rubber to minimize bulk and resist wear from heavy use.Easy adjusting Velcro® strap allows for precise fit.Members typically size the same as their street shoe size.
